ideogram.input
Class AffymetrixCntReaderModel

java.lang.Object
  ideogram.input.AbstractIdeogramDataModel
      ideogram.input.AffymetrixCntReaderModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIdeogramDataModel
public class AffymetrixCntReaderModel
extends AbstractIdeogramDataModel

Reads Affymetrix .CNT files generated by the Chromosome Copy Number Analysis Tool (CNAT).

Author:
jkraus, m. schmid
